room_title: Escape room "The Shady Tavern" by Think Escape Games in Miami
room_address: 2653 E Oakland Park Blvd. Fort Lauderdale, FL 33306
room_description: You are hiding out at The Shady Tavern when you get the call. Your cover has been blown. Someone snitched on you. You’ve lost that game of pool and now you have to pay! Sharky and his gang are waiting for you right outside the front door. You will need all your life skills and wit to bail out before things turn nasty…
